results.title: Team Building (TEFC)
results.brief_description: A group can achieve results greater than the sum of its parts. This program makes recommendations on how to build and maintain an organisational team and discusses several elements that can prevent teams from succeeding.

results.title: Teaching your wings to fly (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Lawren Productions, Anne Lief Barlin and Yasha Aginsky
results.brief_description: Dance instructor Anne Lief Barlin demonstrates how to teach young children 19 movement activities designed to enhance body control, self-esteem, spatial awareness, coordination, relation to others, and relaxation.

results.title: Teaching young children
results.creator_credit: Realist Films, Dorothy Grayson and Jane Massy
results.brief_description: This film deals with infant teaching as a vocation. It is designed for girls between the ages of 16 and 18 years; two girls are introduced, and their two-year course of study at an Infant Teaching Training College in Britain is followed, showing how, both in the college, and in teaching practice, their understanding of children aids them in teaching and at the same time advances and expands their own general education and social consciousness.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Realist Films, Dorothy Grayson and Jane Massy

results.title: Teaching with sound
results.brief_description: A promotional device outlining the potential for sound films as teaching aids, specifically as aids in scientific visualisation. Of historical interest due to its age and the (then) novelty of its subject.

results.title: Teaching the way they learn: remediation of learning disabilities (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Learning Series”.
Dr. Sam Rabinovitch explains some of the methods used in teaching children with learning disabilities due to poor listening ability or poor bodily coordination. Points out how important it is that the child learns and understands what is being taught

results.title: Teaching teenagers about alcohol
results.brief_description: Shows to teachers the best methods of teaching teenagers about alcohol. Uses a summer seminar for teachers as a setting to describe one teacher’s highly successful approach to the problem.

results.title: Teaching sport skills to young athletes (TEFC)
